ticket.title: Durable CAS backend + wiring (replace stub/in-memory CAS in production)

in_scope: Implement durable CAS backend (filesystem or sqlite).
Wire durable CAS into ToolBroker and ToolExecutor.
out_of_scope: Remote object storage backends (S3) for Phase 1.

steps: Implement durable CAS backend with size limits and hash verification.

criteria: Durable CAS persists artifacts across daemon restarts.
Stub/in-memory CAS is not used in production paths.
CAS size limits and hash verification are enforced.

notes.security:
Evidence artifacts must be durable and content-addressed; transient CAS is
not acceptable for FAC v0.
notes.general: Required for ChangeSetBundle/Review artifacts to be authoritative.
